mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CONTRACTS C INNER JOIN CONTRACT_TEMPLATE CT ON C.TEMPLATE_SEQ = CT.TEMPLATE_SEQ INNER JOIN CONTRACT_TEMPLATE_DETAILS CTD ON C.TEMPLATE_SEQ = CTD.TEMPLATE_SEQ WHERE DOC_STATUS IN('PRCS1004','PRCS1005') AND C.PROCESS_STATUS IN('PRCS2003','PRCS2004') AND C.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT CTD.CONTRACT_TITLE_EN AS CONTRACT_TITLE_EN, C.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, C.SIGN_DATE AS SIGN_DATE, C.NAME AS NAME, C.CONTRACT_NO AS CONTRACT_NO, C.CREATED_AT AS CREATED_AT FROM CONTRACTS C INNER JOIN CONTRACT_TEMPLATE CT ON C.TEMPLATE_SEQ = CT.TEMPLATE_SEQ INNER JOIN CONTRACT_TEMPLATE_DETAILS CTD ON C.TEMPLATE_SEQ = CTD.TEMPLATE_SEQ WHERE DOC_STATUS IN('PRCS1004','PRCS1005') AND C.PROCESS_STATUS IN('PRCS2003','PRCS2004') AND C.EMP_NO = #{empNo} LIMIT #{paging.displayRow} OFFSET #{paging.offset}

SELECT C.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, C.NAME AS NAME, C.SIGN_DATE AS SIGN_DATE, CTD.CONTRACT_TITLE_EN AS CONTRACT_TITLE_EN, C.CONTRACT_NO AS CONTRACT_NO , C.CREATED_AT AS CREATED_AT, C.DOC_STATUS AS DOC_STATUS , C.SIGNATURE_DATA_NO AS SIGNATURE_DATA_NO FROM CONTRACTS C INNER JOIN CONTRACT_TEMPLATE CT ON C.TEMPLATE_SEQ = CT.TEMPLATE_SEQ INNER JOIN CONTRACT_TEMPLATE_DETAILS CTD ON C.TEMPLATE_SEQ = CTD.TEMPLATE_SEQ LEFT JOIN FILE_INTEGRATION F ON C.SIGNATURE_DATA_NO = F.FILE_SEQ WHERE C.CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo}
